title: 【#５】　都市伝説解体センター　「罪人の影」　【白上フブキ/ホロライブ】
name: Shirakami Fubuki

entries.text: I was planning to solve the previous one...
Since it was pointed out to me
at the Fox Clan secret meeting.
Or rather, like a sponsored deal...
When recording voices for the public,
I actually do this quite a bit.
"The number one voice in your heart, Shirakami Fubuki!"
I often do lines like, "Lawson is currently holding a collaboration with Hololive!"
I usually keep that idol switch turned off,
so I don't say things like that often.
I'll do it with my "going out" voice.
"True, I hear it at Lawson often."
I suppose I should do it occasionally even in reflection.
Now then, Urban Legend Dissolution Center.
it was like, "If you curse someone..."
Make sure none of you perform curses.
It was a lesson like, "Let's not live while cursing others."
But he really was the King of Scum.
That guy... I won't say he deserved it exactly, but...
Well, he certainly got what was coming to him.
There was no room for sympathy.
Yeah, it was karmic retribution. Completely karmic.
Turns out she really was police. Unexpectedly.
I thought she was an informant or from another organization,
but she's police. And a Superintendent, was it?
That's crazy. She's in a really high position.
And she also seems to be investigating the Center's Director.
And there's a theory that the person in the car with her wasn't Yuma-san.
I've been asking for Yuma-san's name for a while now,
also, did Yamada seriously disappear or not?
Yamada had a pretty good position.
I wonder if Yamada won't show up again after that.
What's going on? Is Yuma-san police too?
I get the feeling he might be police,
but he's just way too suspicious.
I really want to stop calling him Yuma-san
and call him by his actual character name already.
But no info is coming out.
I think this game has 6 chapters total?
We're nearing the end, will we be okay?
Yuma-sorti... Yuma-sama... what is Tengen-sama anyway?
Wait, wait. I forgot what voice I used for the Director.
"They were left at all the crime scenes so far."
I think it was something like this.
"Was in the cursed box recovered from Mayusaki-san."
"If true, I suppose they really are cards that bring misfortune."
"Director, don't the patterns on these cards connect?"
Oh, it's like the pattern written around the box.
"It seems the time has come to consider the meaning and relationship of these cards."
It's like, "Did you find something out?" in a slightly feminine tone.
I got a little happy there.
"The meaning of the information from the closet..."
"I haven't fully organized it yet, but..."
"Then, that child who holds the 'Collapse and Judgment' card..."
"You think she's one of the connections?"
Hey... is Azami going to disappear too?
"Eh, the motifs drawn on Collapse and Judgment?"
Like "I'm watching you, you lolicon" kind of way.
"Yeah, the angel monument at the telephone pole incident scene."
"The same thing was on Gas Mask-san's card."
"Also stairs, a lock, chains, a key, and peering eyes."
"Chains for the eyes peering from the dark."
"A key for the death approaching from the mirror image."
"A lock for the leaking, spreading evil."
"Among the motifs drawn on Collapse and Judgment,"
"The only one left is the other key."
"The Illuminati Card with that key on it..."
"Will likely be obtained in this investigation request."
"So a request has come in after all?"
"This request is from the president of an IT company."
"Perhaps we can get closer to the truth."
"Now that the Illuminati Card prophecies are converging..."
"If something happened to you and your partner..."
Wait, Azami, is it like that?
"You don't need to worry about us."
She's way too suspicious for a police officer.
"This month has many international conferences and ceremonies,"
"And more VIPs are visiting from around the world."
"Security Bureau Chief Kurosawa of the MPD..."
"'Something precious was stolen, I want it back if possible'..."
Maeda chapter was weird, but this isn't like that, right?
"You mean, why not report it to the police?"
"If he knows something was stolen, they'd listen to him."
"It's more reliable than us investigating. True."
In other words, there's something to it.
Maybe he's a CEO doing something bad in secret?
"Then could you investigate the rumors and reputation around that?"
I feel like I saw some "Happy Birthday" posts.
Maybe I did, maybe I didn't.
"Ah, no. I just happened to see him in something recently."
A request from a big CEO like that?
"I bet he's on the top floor of a super skyscraper."
People who can live on the top floor of skyscrapers are amazing.
"It wouldn't hurt to check for shady business rumors or bad reputation."
Maybe. This is the U-Tech Planet official account.
"U-Tech supports a secure IT environment for Japan."
"U-Tech late March announcement. Huge profit increase. Up 51% year-over-year."
"Listed on the stock exchange just 3 years after founding."
"I have no way to convey exactly how amazing, so I'll just say:"
"I don't really get it, but isn't it amazing?"
"This company is strong because they work with government agencies and major corporations."
"Clients are government and big corps. Amazing."
"I have an image of getting paid big bucks for easy work, but I guess not."
"It's national info, so it's probably really hard."
"The person in charge must be under insane stress."
"If you mess up, you're fired for sure."
Ah, the urban legend where if you post that word on SNS,
you get a reply from the dead.
He says it's not about getting a reply from the dead.
Engineers can't do anything about that.
"If you lose this duel, I'm taking you to the List!"
"Win or lose, I'm taking you to the List!"
"I think we have enough search words now."
"The unconventional reflections told by the CEO,"
"Knowing my path because I took the long way around."
IT presidents are usually like that.
"How many lives can you redo with 70 billion yen?"
"You can't spend 70 billion in one lifetime, can you?"
How many times can you reincarnate?
"People who were wild in their youth,"
is more convenient in various ways.
"He's a super rich kid. His family is powerful."
You can go to space with 700 yen... wait.
You can't go to space with 700 yen.
"No, even a gambler couldn't blow 70 billion in a day, right?"
"A game where you bet 100 million a time?"
"If your parents are rich, you succeed at everything."
"Must be nice to pull an SSR in the parent gacha."
Since the path is set for them,
I just imagine they feel constricted.
Parents are wealthy, so the kid becomes wealthy too, right?
I think everyone means Great Reset.
"Thought he was a celebrity for a second."
"Really nice clothes, gave a good impression."
"Had zero aura, so plain I thought he was a random guy."
"Tried to say hi but he glared at me."
Something's different between these two accounts.
One says good impression, one says he glared.
He must have an on/off switch.
Gotta separate the diligent face from the private face.
Or you can't be an IT president.
"From leader of a popular streamer group..."
He used to be a streamer.
So far, it's just rumors like spotting a celeb in town.
Doesn't seem to be any problem up to this point.
It's a company that's actually evaluated normally.
"Guess we just have to ask the man himself."
So I can become a 70 billion yen president?
I'm fine being a 700 yen president.
70 billion is too much of a dream.
"Jasmine-san, it really is a super skyscraper."
"No doubt. The president is on the top floor."
"Right right. Just don't get unnecessarily nervous."
I feel like I'm going to mess up.
"You're from the Urban Legend Dissolution Center."
Oh, a nice lady with glasses.
"So I haven't memorized her name yet."
Don't get to say that often.
"You wanted us to retrieve a stolen item?"
"Then, to ask again, what was stolen?"
"However, there is no doubt an intruder appeared."
"If there really was an intruder, I think you should call the police."
"So we want to avoid making a big scene."
"Also, I want someone to view the situation objectively."
"Because something that strange happened the day before yesterday."
"I hear you people are good at that kind of investigation."
"But that will take a little more time."
"First, if you listen to me and my secretary, you'll understand the strangeness."
"I'll try to grasp what happened the day before yesterday from my perspective."
Ah, I feel like I'm being jerked around.
"We should probably be careful with this investigation."
"Can't talk details, didn't report to police."
"I'll be careful as I start investigating."
Well, let's go to the secretary.
"Excuse me, I'd like to ask you something."
"Yes, I am the president's secretary, Kiyomoto."
"The President told me to testify exactly what I saw without lying."
"Please ask anything related to the investigation."
"I'd like to ask about the day before yesterday."
"Even if you ask what happened, nothing in particular..."
"The President asked me too, but I have no idea."
"I see. Could you tell me about it anyway?"
"The President said he was going to a client, so I saw him off."
"Then he came back a while later."
"I greeted the President upon his return,"
"And after that, it was business as usual."
"Please ask the secretary about the day before yesterday."
Ah, just in case, about that day.
"Kurosawa-san, can I ask about the day before yesterday?"
"First, all I can say is something precious was stolen."
"I'll tell you the rest after you talk to my secretary."
"Even though Kiyomoto-san didn't seem to know anything."
"Maybe if I investigate traces here, I can find a lead."
But it could be the intruder.
Seems to be touching the top drawer.
Eh? Is this shadow looking at me?
Holding something, but I can't tell what.
Definitely holding something in the left hand.
I feel like it's watching me.
So this is the President's desk.
No way. So this case too...
Do you know about it, Kurosawa?
"Does that have something to do with your investigation?"
"In that case, could you put it back and continue your work?"
Oops, he knows about the cards.
The shadow definitely took something from the drawer.
It was the top drawer, right?
I wonder if anything is missing from this drawer.
"Was anything stolen from the top drawer of your desk?"
"How do you know it was the desk drawer?"
"I have a slightly unusual ability called Psychometry."
"Even if I say that, you probably won't believe me."
"Yes. I'm very interested, and it seems like it will be useful for this case."
"I'll verify what was stolen from the drawer, so could you ask my secretary?"
The secretary doesn't know anything, right?
About the item the President took out.
"Did Kurosawa-san take anything out of the office the day before yesterday?"
"Now that you mention it, he left holding something like a red card."
Eh, you mean an Illuminati Card?
"No, it was something completely different, so I wouldn't mistake it."
"I don't know exactly what it was,"
"But I remember the President treating it very carefully."
If something is actually missing, then there really was an intruder.
Ah, was anything strange about the President?
"Did the President seem odd the day before yesterday?"
"I don't think there was anything odd."
"I greeted him, and he gave a slight bow."
"I mentioned he left holding something red,"
"Strictly speaking, just as I thought he took out that red thing,"
"Didn't he just leave while you looked away?"
"I thought he opened the office door,"
"But the next moment, he was gone."
She looks serious, doesn't seem like she's lying.
Kurosawa, or rather, the vanished Kurosawa.
"Do you have a moment? About the red card-like object."
"Kurosawa-san, I heard you took something from the top drawer that day."
"I didn't return to this room from the client's office that day."
"So it's impossible for me to have taken anything out."
"What impression did you get from her?"
"Did you think she was telling the truth?"
"That is the strange thing I wanted to tell you."
You mean there are two Kurosawa-sans?
"She said after taking the item from the desk, you suddenly vanished."
"Since she went out of her way to say it, I don't think she just missed it."
The thing where you die if you see it.
"I'm sorry, but could you confirm with my secretary one more time, carefully?"
"R-Right. I'll ask Kiyomoto-san one more time."
Strange thing. Ah, should we contact the police, just in case?
"If something really was stolen, the police would listen."
"What will you do? Contact the police?"
"About the stolen item... please consider it top secret."
"It concerns our credibility, so please proceed with caution."
He's making me go back and forth a lot.
Why doesn't he just ask her with me?
Right, Kurosawa-san had something stolen. What was it?
But he won't tell us what that "something" is.
"Kurosawa Yuya is the former leader of a popular streamer group."
"Um, the day before yesterday, you were in this room with the President, right?"
"Yes, well, it was only for about an hour."
If it's a Dark History Notebook, that is top secret.
A red Dark History Notebook is quite something.
If it's a Dark History Notebook, it is top secret.
If Shirakami's Dark History Notebook was stolen,
that would be a top secret emergency.
Like dark history from his streamer days written in it.
Like a joke book from when he was streaming.
Maybe there's a notebook with project ideas.
"And he took a red card-like object from the drawer and left, right?"
"Kurosawa-san says he didn't take that red thing out."
"Was the important item the President mentioned that thing?"
"But I saw him take it out of the desk with my own eyes."
It has characters drawn for a Dark History Card Battle with Marine from way back.
Kurosawa-san doesn't remember her name, when did she join?
One year ago is recent, right? Recent.
Does this company have high turnover?
Okay. Kiyomoto-san, recently hired secretary, name not memorized yet.
The person she thought was the President and greeted might not be him.
"Hmm, I asked Secretary Kiyomoto as Kurosawa-san requested,"
"But she says the day before yesterday was just a normal day."
"But Kurosawa-san wasn't in the office, yet something is missing."
"A simple mistake? Just forgetting his own actions?"
"Since something is missing, there's no doubt an intruder was here."
"Why do their stories conflict so much?"
The intruder was the President's office...
The intruder was Kiyomoto-san... something something.
The intruder disguised themselves to look like Kurosawa-san.
She only bowed, so she didn't hear his voice.
"Maybe the intruder was disguised to look like Kurosawa-san."
"Kiyomoto-san's testimony about the missing item wasn't wrong."
"Someone who looked like Kurosawa-san was definitely here."
"But does that mean they looked similar enough to be mistaken?"
"I need to investigate the intruder more."
"A way to confirm if it was the President..."
What is the red card-like something?
If something that flashy was in the drawer, it'd be easy to find.
Did Kurosawa-san take it out himself?
"There's a machine attached to the door."
"But getting into this room seems difficult."
Ah, possibility that security here is tight too.
"Do you need a key to enter this room?"
"Does every employee have a security card?"
"However, since there is important information from other companies,"
"Even I am not allowed in this room when the President is away."
"Azami, you're starting to look like a real investigator."
"First, we have to find out what happened around Kurosawa."
"A strange thing. I don't get why he wants an objective view."
"Secretary Kiyomoto-san doesn't seem to understand what happened that day,"
"But he insists we talk to her."
"Why did he make us investigate Kurosawa-san?"
Maybe he wants private detectives like us to investigate
and find faults with his secretary?
"Well, first we need to find out what that strange thing is."
"From what I've heard, there doesn't seem to be a problem so far."
"Ah, but a red card-like thing is missing."
"We have to find proof that someone was in this room that day."
Red... it's not fallen on the floor.
"Come to think of it, Kurosawa-san said he was having the footage analyzed."
"Just now, the General Affairs department managing the cameras"
Oi, he's entering! The real guy.
"How does this look to you, Kiyomoto-san?"
Heh, so it is a Doppelganger?
This is as hard as the spot-the-difference in Saizeriya.
"I received it from your secretary, Kiyomoto-san."
"It resembles me enough that I can't blame anyone for mistaking it."
"Could Kurosawa-san have forgotten returning to this room that day?"
"That's impossible. The client can prove it."
"And something is actually missing from this room."
Is there a slight mole or something?
Under the left eye (from our view, right eye from camera)...
I thought it was a wrinkle, but is it a mole?
Maybe a mole. I thought it was a wrinkle.
"Jasmine-san, I've finished the on-site investigation for now."
"He won't tell me exactly what was stolen,"
"And he was strangely impressed by my Psychometry."
"I feel like he's hiding something too."
"When I used Psychometry in the office, the shadow felt different from usual."
"Also, there was an Illuminati Card. Kurosawa-san had it."
"I look forward to the investigation report."
"Based on the request, this is a very strange case for us to handle."
"Indeed. It was content only we could handle."
"At first I thought it was simple theft,"
"But there was an Illuminati Card too."
"We cannot leave this case simply as 'strange'."
"He asked you to speak to his secretary, Kiyomoto-san."
"Yes. So I heard about that day from Kiyomoto-san."
"Azami-san, what was the strange story you heard from Kiyomoto-san?"
"Kurosawa-san was there when he shouldn't have been."
"Even though they were in the same room for a while,"
"And behaved naturally, as if he were the real person."
"It was so natural that anyone would doubt their own memory."
"Now then, regarding the fake Kurosawa who came to the office"
"As if he were Kurosawa Yuya himself."
"The only witness is the secretary, Kiyomoto-san."
"Her testimony contained an important characteristic for this entity."
"Between the fake Kurosawa appearing and leaving,"
"What kind of contact did Kiyomoto-san have with him?"
Strange feeling... Only greeted... Strange feeling during greeting... Business as usual... Only greeted... Greeting was a bow.
"Yeah, she said they exchanged a slight bow but didn't talk."
"She said it felt normal, so she didn't feel anything strange."
"Kiyomoto-san did not converse with the fake Kurosawa."
"If they had exchanged even a single word, the story might have changed."
"True, you can tell by the voice."
"Eh, no. She noticed and said she greeted him."
"Right. Furthermore, even though they were in the same room for an hour,"
"Kiyomoto-san believed the fake Kurosawa was the real one."
"However, a client can prove Kurosawa-san wasn't there."
"What kind of existence is this fake Kurosawa that appeared in the office?"
Entity almost identical to the President... Disguised as President...
"I am Kurosawa Fubuki with 70 billion in assets."
I have to become Kurosawa and get that 70 billion.
I'd be troubled if I got it though.
"The security footage makes it clear the appearance was identical."
"However, it can be proven the real person was elsewhere."
"It's as if there is another version of him."
"But the figure on camera looks just like another him."
"The urban legend derived from this situation..."
"But you know, there's a saying that there are 3 people in the world who look like you."
"Only the person themselves can distinguish it."
"The terrifying part of this phenomenon is that meeting it results in death."
"I hope Kurosawa-san takes plenty of care"
"Is the Doppelganger urban legend that scary?"
"Right, right. We received an additional request from Kurosawa-san."
"I may be out of contact for a while,"
"But don't worry. Please continue the on-site investigation."
"You said you'll be out of contact..."
"Will we be okay on our own?"
"My phone will just be unreachable. It's not much different from usual."
"Not being able to rely on you in a pinch is a bit..."
His mouth was like, "What are you laughing at?"
"'It was in my room! It got away!'"
"Well, he contacted me personally, so he's probably fine for now."
"Eh, this is gonna turn into a 'which is the real one' situation."
"Let's avoid mentioning the 'Doppelganger death theory' in front of him."
"He called us, so I think he's safe for now, but..."
"No, I haven't heard from her since."
"Don't tell me she's leaving the dissolution to us too?"
"We're going to gather rumors about Doppelgangers now,"
"But is there anything else concerning you?"
"Azami, you're really growing as an investigator."
"Then, could you look into Zima too?"
"But is there a connection between Kurosawa-san and Zima?"
"Don't you know? Kurosawa is hated by Zima members."
"Well, likes and dislikes don't matter much,"
"I'll track rumors about Doppelgangers and Kurosawa-san's antis."
"Getting listed in just 3 years is unthinkable at his age."
"He only has his position because of his family."
"He talks about hard work and struggle,"
"But he's seen as a naive rich boy."
"If he has a good family and money, why not use it?"
"Going public that fast is weird. How many lives has he lived?"
I wonder which loop the President is on.
Do you think he's living a "Brush Up Life"?
"If you get serious, it's surprisingly fast."
"Maybe the Kurosawa we see is actually a Doppelganger."
Ah, he really is the real Kurosawa-san.
"Urban legends say people have seen them meeting."
Do you guys have Doppel stories?
"Lots of people curious. Look into it."
Have you ever seen someone who looks like you?
"Even if someone says 'I saw you walking arm-in-arm with a girl yesterday',"
"Maybe the Doppelganger got a girlfriend before me."
"Many people told me there's a guy who looks just like me."
The Doppelganger is getting a girlfriend!
"It is said to be a hallucination where one sees oneself."
But the housekeeper saw it too.
"There are theories of Future Self, Living Spirit, etc."
"I talked to him and he was totally that guy,"
"He was overseas at the time, so we couldn't have met."
"The urban legend Doppelganger usually has rules like"
"Only appears in places connected to the person."
So that's why he only bowed.
Like his parents' home, or his house.
"I saw myself when I was young at my rural home,"
"You hear stories about coming home and finding your Doppelganger already there? Super scary."
"You die if you meet a Doppel, right?"
"Why does meeting one lead to death?"
"Rather than dying because you saw it,"
"Maybe people close to death see hallucinations of themselves."
People who will die soon see it.
Written as Death God, read as Doppelganger.
Even someone else's Doppelganger is bad.
"I thought you died from shock seeing it."
"But you die if you see someone else's?"
"The soul or spirit body that left the flesh is the Doppelganger,"
"So seeing it means the body has no soul,"
"I heard it means you'll die eventually."
"People who said they saw a Doppelganger and died"
"Might have had brain tumors, so you can't mock it."
"I see. The brain tumor shows a hallucination of oneself."
"There's a story that the Doppelganger kills the original to take their place."
"In that sense, Gum Humans are close to Doppelgangers too."
"The original is disposed of and replaced by a Gum Human."
"According to the Doppelganger = Time Slip theory,"
"Meeting yourself creates a paradox and you die."
Being in the same spacetime is impossible, so you die from the paradox.
"World Simulator Hypothesis: Doppelganger is a bug,"
Might be someone's miniature garden game.
"The story about dying if you meet a Doppelganger."
"Nobody has actually seen the moment of death."
"Umu! GR! GR! GR! GR! GR! GR! GR! GR! GR!"
"Kisaragi Tsutomu-sama saying 'The day will come when you see the light'"
"If you think waiting with your mouth open will get you fed,"
"That step will change society and the world."
"But seeing how much the impression changes by reader..."
"Maybe Kisaragi Tsutomu-sama's words have a strange persuasive power."
"Exactly. It means the collapse of values that happens right after the update."
"Causing that collapse is what Kisaragi Tsutomu was trying to achieve."
"Ah, maybe the text left the answer or mindset up to the reader."
"I feel like it was just 'This is how I, Kisaragi Tsutomu, think.'"
"Depending on the reader (Yomusu?), the hope gained was immense."
"Ah, I see. That kind of thing."
"For those who empathize, Kisaragi has tremendous influence."
"Yeah. Labeling otaku traits, pasting an image of half-truth half-label,"
"And writing about the experience of being bashed conveniently."
"Really? Fujiwara-san from Occult Search said something similar."
"Ah, that's because Kisaragi Tsutomu was an assistant professor"
"And an occult researcher, so he was treated like an otaku."
"When you want stimulation or a quick sense of superiority,"
"Focusing only on that is a bad human habit."
"When you want stimulation or a quick sense of superiority,"
"Focusing only on that is a bad human habit."
"Destroying the society built by short-sighted fools. GR."
"To me, it looks like they're shouting Kisaragi Tsutomu's ideas"
"To do things they can't do alone."
"Before I knew it, we were on Kisaragi Tsutomu info."
"Kisaragi-san's name comes up a lot when investigating Zima."
"How about Doppelganger info? Did you mark it?"
"Ah, yes! Lots of crazy stuff on Doppelgangers."
"Hmm, we're almost at President Kurosawa's home."
"Well, a Doppelganger appeared in the office,"
"So I don't think it means absolute death."
"It had terrifying eyes, but it looked exactly like me."
Wait, this is scary. What if they swapped?
"Making a fuss over this would hurt the company's credibility."
"Anyway, please find out what it was doing in this house."
"I have a housekeeper, she saw it too."
"You should be able to hear from her."
"Bringing two women home in the middle of the day, what does this mean?"
"This is business, so keep quiet for a bit."
"Received a message from me that I don't remember sending."
"It asked various things about my room."
"I want you to investigate that exchange too."
Eh? The Doppelganger made a girlfriend?
"Jasmine-san, what do you think of this case?"
There's a lot. As expected of Kurosawa-san.
Kurosawa-san has been an elite since he was a student.
"He has a 1 million Gold Shield too."
"I'm from the Urban Legend Dissolution Center,"
"Ah, yes. I heard from the Master."
"I'm Honda, the housekeeper of this home."
"Can you tell me about the man who looked just like Kurosawa-san yesterday?"
"The Master returned and went straight to his room."
"While preparing dinner, I heard the front door open again."
"When I looked, the Master was standing there."
"I think I said, 'Didn't you just come home?'"
"The Master headed to his room, and shortly after I heard a scream."
"Immediately after, the Master came out of his room."
"Then, another Master came out chasing him."
"By that time, the Master who came out first had vanished."
Eh, so it's a real Doppelganger?
Eh? This isn't like "match your stories," right? Probably.
"Do you know what his room is like?"
"I only clean areas other than the Master's room."
"He has work things he can't show others in there."
"I was told absolutely never to enter."
"You work as a housekeeper at Kurosawa-san's house."
"I've been a housekeeper for a long time,"
"Well, at my age, I have to work to make ends meet."
"I wish he'd raise my wage a bit..."
"If the Master hears that, I might get fired."
"Just to confirm, did you speak to the first Kurosawa-san?"
"I intended to treat him as usual."
"The one who came later is probably the real one."
"Something is written on the trophy Kurosawa-san is holding."
"Excuse me, do you have a moment?"
"Um, I might be able to help."
"I'm from the Urban Legend Dissolution Center."
"Someone who looks just like him seems to be doing bad things."
"And I saw it, so I'm sure."
"Like, I don't get bringing two women home."
"Aika-san, strange things are happening around Kurosawa-san."
"And danger might reach you too, Aika-san."
"But the one who contacted you was likely the Doppelganger."
"Eh? So that meaningless DM the other day"
"Wasn't Yuya acting up, but someone else?"
"I have another question about the Doppelganger."
